detectors.description:
Reentrancy in Marketplace.buyToken(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Marketplace.sol#608-653):
	External calls:
	- IERC1155(offers[_offerId].tokenAddress).safeTransferFrom(offers[_offerId].seller,msg.sender,offers[_offerId].tokenId,_tokenAmount,0x0) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Marketplace.sol#636-642)
	External calls sending eth:
	- _pushPayment(offers[_offerId].seller,msg.value) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Marketplace.sol#644)
		- _seller.transfer(_amount) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Marketplace.sol#43)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- OfferSuccess(offers[_offerId].tokenAddress,offers[_offerId].tokenId,msg.value,_offerId,msg.sender) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Marketplace.sol#646-652)
